title: Ward Hunt - Game
body:
> HOW TO PLAY:
{[SUMMONERS RIFT]}

1. EVERYONE buys 1 pink ward
2. place you pink ward anywhere where you DON'T want the enemy to find it easily
3. you can ONLY place you pink ward in your side of the JG and the river
4. when your all ready, HUNT down your enemies wards and destroy it(YOU CAN ALSO KILL PEOPLE)
5. the 1st one to destroy all the enemies wards get 1 point
6. DO STEP 1 TO STEP 5 AGAIN UNTIL SOMEONE GET 5 POINTS AND THEY WIN
7. IF YOU CAN'T BUY A PINK WARD FARM OFF MINIONS TO GET ONE

> WHAT ELSE CAN YOU BUY?
YOU CAN ONLY BUY... 

* {{item:1001}} (CAN BE UPGRADED)
* {{item:3340}} (CAN BE UPGRADED)

> SPELLS YOU CAN'T USE

* {{summoner:12}} 


> PERMA BAN CHAMPS

* {{champion:4}} 
* {{champion:28}} 
* {{champion:80}}

replies.body: I can only see this being possible to play in a custom match with friends because people wont play the game properly. Some people might not want to do it while everyone else does and that person would just lane. And while searching for wards theres another problem (or it could be another factor to the game). Minions... While you're running around looking for wards nothing would be more frustrating than hearing the announcer "Your inhibitor has been destroyed.

This would be better as a team game, rather than individual points.

I'm sure a Rioter would like to organise a game of this though!

Regards,
